content:
本件保存 X
年
NG - 35-11
MAY 1 1962
ME. Ini Ming Manager, Fa Him Shipping Company 83 Sin Yi Koud, Section 4 Taipei
Door Mr. Lai:
This refers to your letter of April 19 which resened us this morning. Though we are glad to learn of your interest in the ship for improving freight services between Taimon and the Offshore Islands, we fear the opportunity for buying this megsok had already boon passed and it is no longer available for Tajine. At any rate, since the acquisition of this vessel was a matter concerning the Chinese Govern- ment, we would spogest that you contact lir. K. C. Toh in the Second Division of CUJA should you have any further questions regarding it. Meanwhile, we are forwarding your letter to him for his reference. Sincerely yours,
Bort Fraleigh Area Operations Officer
51.5 1

lines.content: This refers to your letter of April 19 which resened us this
morning. Though we are glad to learn of your interest in the ship for
improving freight services between Taimon and the Offshore Islands, we
fear the opportunity for buying this megsok had already boon passed
and it is no longer available for Tajine. At any rate, since the
acquisition of this vessel was a matter concerning the Chinese Govern-
ment, we would spogest that you contact lir. K. C. Toh in the Second
Division of CUJA should you have any further questions regarding it.
Meanwhile, we are forwarding your letter to him for his reference.

This refers to your letter of April 19 which resened us this morning. Though we are glad to learn of your interest in the ship for improving freight services between Taimon and the Offshore Islands, we fear the opportunity for buying this megsok had already boon passed and it is no longer available for Tajine. At any rate, since the acquisition of this vessel was a matter concerning the Chinese Govern- ment, we would spogest that you contact lir. K. C. Toh in the Second Division of CUJA should you have any further questions regarding it. Meanwhile, we are forwarding your letter to him for his reference. Sincerely yours,
